reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Strengthening the fight against illicit trade of cultural property in Jordan

description.narrative: This activity implements some of the key recommendations of the needs assessment on the means to counter illicit trade of antiquities in Jordan which was undertaken by the UNESCO Amman Office during the 2016-2017 biennium (38 C/5). During the 2018-2019 biennium (39 C/5), technical expertise will be provided to the government of Jordan to strengthen its national legal framework for countering illicit trade of antiquities, guiding the government in possible future restitution cases, and advise on the ratification of the UNIDROIT Convention and the adoption of other relevant international instruments. A series of capacity-building activities will be implemented to enhance the capacities of the local stakeholders to respond to the threats posed by illicit trade of antiquities in Jordan.

organisation.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
